content: too tightly here you may find it helpful to try a stretchy bind off technique to complete your project i like to use the k2 through the back loop decrease method - it also makes a beautiful top edge that looks really nice there are dozens of great tutorials on the internet to perfect this bind off here is one of my favorites from lizzy knits https //youtu be/fnul7eo52o4 cut yarn leave a long tail weave in your ends to finish i suggest steam or wet blocking your work to smooth out the bind off area and shape the cowl making it even and flat i prefer to use a handheld steamer and lay the cowl for a day to dry theo s cowl | north road knits ©2025 | 3
